title: Nath Cyber Cafe marketing website (multi-page) frontend

requirements.summary: Implement a modern, minimalist, responsive site theme (royal blue/cyan/white) with consistent typography and layout primitives.
acceptanceCriteria: Site layout is fully responsive across mobile/tablet/desktop and maintains a clean minimalist look
Color palette primarily uses royal blue, cyan, and white consistently across components
Typography uses a modern sans-serif font stack and consistent heading/body scales

file_operations.description: Create global styles: set a modern sans-serif font stack, define theme CSS variables and Tailwind base styles for royal blue/cyan/white palette, and ensure accessible focus/selection styles.
Adjust Tailwind theme tokens (via CSS variables / extended colors) to support the royal blue/cyan/white brand palette and consistent radii/shadows for a clean minimalist UI.
Create a small layout primitive for consistent responsive page width/padding and section spacing.

requirements.summary: Add routing and page structure for Home, About, Services, Contact with shared header/nav and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can navigate to Home, About, Services, and Contact from the primary navigation
Each page has a consistent header/nav and footer
Routes are direct-loadable (refreshing on a page keeps the user on the same route)

file_operations.description: Create the app root wiring with a router and shared layout wrapper for all pages (header + footer).
Implement route definitions for Home, About, Services, and Contact using a refresh-safe routing strategy (e.g., hash-based routing) to ensure direct-loadable navigation.

Create the consistent site header with logo and primary navigation links to Home/About/Services/Contact. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) for nav CTAs where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the consistent site footer area with social links, contact quick info, and brand styling. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) for icon/link affordances as needed. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a shared layout component that renders SiteHeader, page content, and SiteFooter consistently across all routes.
Create the Home page and wire required sections (hero, services preview, why choose us, contact CTA).
Create the About Us page with a short professional description of Nath Cyber Cafe as a trusted digital service center.
Create the Services page with the full categorized service listing.
Create the Contact page including business info, WhatsApp button, contact form, and map embed placeholder.

requirements.summary: Build the Home page hero with exact copy, CTAs to Contact/Services, and a professional digital-services illustration from a static asset.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero renders the headline and subheading exactly as provided
“Contact Now” CTA navigates to the Contact page (or contact section)
“View Services” CTA navigates to the Services page (or services section)
Hero includes a professional digital/computer-themed illustration rendered from a static asset

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero illustration asset at the exact path for use by the Home hero section.

Implement the hero section UI using the exact headline “Complete Digital & Online Services Under One Roof” and subheading “Fast, Trusted & Affordable Services”, plus two CTAs (“Contact Now”, “View Services”) wired to routing. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) for CTA styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire HeroSection into the Home page and ensure the illustration is rendered from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-illustration.dim_1200x800.png.

requirements.summary: Render categorized service blocks on Home (preview) and Services (detailed) with the exact provided categories and item wording.
acceptanceCriteria: All listed categories and service items appear in the UI with the same wording as provided
Home page includes a services preview/section; Services page includes the full detailed listing
Service blocks are responsive (stack on mobile, multi-column on larger screens) and visually consistent with the site theme

file_operations.description: Centralize the services categories and items as a typed content module to ensure wording matches exactly and is reused across Home preview and Services page.

Create a responsive categorized services grid component (cards/sections) for reuse. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) to provide consistent blocks. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the Home page services preview section that reuses the shared services grid but shows a subset/summary while keeping wording consistent.
Add ServicesPreviewSection to the Home page below the hero.
Render the full detailed service listing using ServiceCategoryGrid and the centralized content module.

requirements.summary: Add a responsive “Why Choose Us” section with the four specified points.
acceptanceCriteria: Section displays all four points clearly (e.g., cards or bullet highlights)
Section is responsive and matches the professional/trustworthy styling

file_operations.description: Implement the “Why Choose Us” section showing: Fast & Trusted Service; Affordable Charges; Proper Guidance; Customer Satisfaction Priority. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) for consistent highlights. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire WhyChooseUsSection into the Home page.

requirements.summary: Implement Contact page features: exact business info, WhatsApp chat button, validated contact form with success/error states, and a Google Map embed placeholder area.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page/section displays the business name and phone numbers exactly as provided
WhatsApp button opens a WhatsApp chat using a wa.me link (or equivalent) to a configured phone number
Contact form validates required fields and shows a clear success/error state after submission
Google Map embed area is present and uses a placeholder location (easy to update later)
Contact form submission is handled by the Motoko backend and persists submitted messages in canister state

file_operations.description: Centralize cafe display info (name, phone numbers, default WhatsApp number, map placeholder URL/embed config) for reuse in header/footer/contact sections.
Create a small data hook to read cafe info from the backend interface (e.g., getCafeInfo) and fall back to frontend defaults if unavailable.
Create a hook that submits contact form data to the backend interface (submitContact) and exposes loading/success/error state for the UI.

Implement a WhatsApp chat button that builds a wa.me (or equivalent) link from configured WhatsApp/phone number. Use shadcn-ui Button for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement the contact form with fields (Name, Phone, Message), required validation, and clear success/error UI after submit. Use shadcn-ui form inputs (e.g., Input, Textarea, Button) where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a Google Map embed area component that uses a placeholder location (easy to update later) and is responsive.
Render the business name “Nath Cyber Cafe”, phone numbers “9435212145 / 91260 26463” exactly, include WhatsAppButton, ContactForm, and MapEmbedPlaceholder laid out responsively.

requirements.summary: Add social media icon/link set in the footer (and/or contact area) with centralized placeholder URLs.
acceptanceCriteria: Social links are visible and styled consistently with the theme
URLs are centralized/configurable and default to placeholders (non-breaking) until real links are provided

file_operations.description: Create a centralized configuration object for common social platforms with placeholder URLs (non-breaking defaults).

Create a social links/icon strip component that reads from the centralized config and renders accessible links. Use shadcn-ui Button (or similar) for consistent icon-button styling if applicable. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire SocialLinks into the footer and ensure styling matches the royal blue/cyan/white theme.
Optionally include SocialLinks near contact details (if desired) without duplicating configuration.

requirements.summary: Implement SEO-friendly per-page titles/meta, Open Graph/Twitter tags, semantic headings, and LocalBusiness JSON-LD for Nath Cyber Cafe with provided phone numbers.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page sets an appropriate document title
Meta description and social preview tags are present for main pages
Pages use semantic structure (single H1 per page, logical H2/H3)
LocalBusiness JSON-LD is included and references “Nath Cyber Cafe” and the provided phone numbers

file_operations.description: Create a lightweight SEO component that sets document title, meta description, Open Graph/Twitter tags, and injects LocalBusiness JSON-LD (including “Nath Cyber Cafe” and phone numbers) without adding heavy dependencies.
Add Seo usage with Home-specific title/description and ensure semantic headings (single H1, logical H2/H3).
Add Seo usage with About-specific title/description and ensure semantic headings (single H1, logical H2/H3).
Add Seo usage with Services-specific title/description and ensure semantic headings (single H1, logical H2/H3).
Add Seo usage with Contact-specific title/description and ensure semantic headings (single H1, logical H2/H3).

requirements.summary: Ensure fast loading and a polished accessible UI: optimized static assets, minimal dependencies, strong focus states, and no console errors.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero illustration and any added images are appropriately sized/compressed and served as static assets
UI components have visible focus states and acceptable contrast for text and interactive elements
No console errors on load; page interactions feel responsive on mobile

file_operations.description: Add the generated logo asset at the exact path for use in header/footer branding.
Add the generated favicon asset at the exact path for use by the document head.
Wire the favicon from frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon.dim_64x64.png and ensure baseline meta tags exist for responsive rendering.
Render brand logo using frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_512x512.png and ensure interactive elements have clear focus styles (leveraging global/tailwind focus-visible styles).
Ensure accessible focus-visible ring styles, link hover/focus states, and sufficient default text contrast to support a polished professional UI without additional heavy libraries.
